alert.note: Alert for Benton; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 7:03AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Benton, northwestern Washington, southeastern Delaware, northern Adair and northeastern Cherokee Counties through 745 AM CST... At 702 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles west of Anderson to 3 miles south of Tahlequah. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Bentonville... Bella Vista... Tahlequah... Siloam Springs... Gentry... Gravette... Decatur... Westville... West Siloam Springs... Colcord... Kansas... Highfill... Watts... Oaks... Springtown... Christie... Northwest Arkansas Regional Air... Cincinnati... Maryetta... Hiwasse... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
